title: And you wonder why I hate the bronze queue
body:
Him and 2 others were on skype, that was the shit I took all game. Whilst my KDA was worse than some, I done more damage, took more damage, YES, I took MORE damage than Morde, took more towers and more CS and ended on a higher level.

But no, Morde added that three of them were on Skype, it's no wonder I was getting abused, they have to blame someone for a loss.

No you fucking tell me, MORDE, MALPH and SHACO were premade, I can see that from their current game and most of their last games the three of them were in the same team, go look at this game http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/122043119/200513795 and all of their previous ones and you tell me, did I deserve 30 minutes of shit talk and the blame for losing?

replies.body: Perhaps you didn't deserve this game and they shouldn't be acting like that but naming and shaming isn't allowed on here bud. It doesn't help the situation and it just makes you look worse. All you can do is report them and send a support ticket if you feel it needs that attention.
Yeh fuck the naming and shaming rules, these people don't deserve to play if they are going to go premade and give constant shit to someone else.
Just an fyi, you aren't aloud to name and shame on here, all you can do is send in a support ticket
Yeh fuck the naming and shaming rules, these people don't deserve to play if they are going to go premade and give constant shit to someone else.

**This happens in every single elo.**
 When you get silver+ this kind of sh♥t isn't magically going to disappear. It wont even disappear if you manage to get diamond.
[Go make/join a premade team](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) if you're so sick of this kind of behaviour (you made a similar qq post 15 hours ago)
